name: Intezer
description: Intezer connector for Splunk SOAR enables security teams to automate the analysis, detection, and response of threats by integrating Intezer's technology into their Splunk workflows

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Analyze a file from Splunk vault with Intezer
actions.verbose: Analyze a file from Splunk Vault. The action returns the analysis ID and status.

related_alert_id.description: The alert ID that the file is related to

actions.description: Analyze a file hash (SHA1, SHA256, or MD5) with Intezer
actions.verbose: Analyze a hash from Splunk Vault. The action returns the analysis ID and status.

actions.description: Get a file analysis report based on an analysis ID or a file hash
actions.verbose: Get a file analysis report based on an analysis ID or a file hash.

analysis_id.description: File analysis ID. The analysis ID is returned when submitting a file or a hash for analysis

private_only.description: The "private_only" parameter, used when retrieving analysis reports by file hash, determines database access: "false" (default) uses both public and private databases, consuming additional quota for first-time public access; "true" uses only your private database, conserving quota

wait_for_completion.description: Whether to wait for the analysis to finish

actions.description: Analyze a suspicious URL with Intezer
actions.verbose: Analyze a suspicious URL with Intezer.

actions.description: Get a URL analysis report based on a URL analysis ID
actions.verbose: Get a URL analysis report based on a URL analysis ID.

analysis_id.description: URL analysis ID. The analysis ID is returned when submitting a URL for analysis

wait_for_completion.description: Whether to wait for the analysis to finish

actions.description: Get an ingested alert triage and response information using alert ID
actions.verbose: Get an ingested alert triage and response information using alert ID.

wait_for_completion.description: Whether to wait for the analysis to finish

actions.description: Submit a new alert, including the raw alert information, to Intezer for processing
actions.verbose: Submit a new alert, including the raw alert information, to Intezer for processing.

raw_alert.description: The alert raw data in JSON format
raw_alert.name: raw_alert

alert_mapping.description: The mapping to use for the alert in JSON formant
alert_mapping.name: alert_mapping

actions.description: Submit a suspicious phishing email in a raw format (.MSG or .EML) to Intezer for processing
actions.verbose: Submit a suspicious phishing email in a raw format (.MSG or .EML) to Intezer for processing.

vault_id.description: The vault ID of the email to submit
vault_id.name: vault_id

actions.description: Index the file's genes into the organizational database
actions.verbose: Index the file's genes into the organizational database.
